events.message: We have received an application from John Doe for the software engineer position in our backend team.
John's application was reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster based on his experience as a software developer.
Recruiter Emily Parker has been assigned to manage John's candidacy for the software engineer role.
Emily conducted an initial screening call with John to assess his programming skills and cultural fit for the company.
John responded promptly expressing enthusiasm for the role and providing additional details on his previous projects.
A technical interview has been scheduled for John on May 15th at 10 AM with the engineering lead to evaluate his coding proficiency.
